content: [Quantum Computing Breakthrough] Google's Sycamore chip achieved 'quantum supremacy', performing a calculation in 200 seconds that would take the world's fastest supercomputer 10,000 years. https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-019-03213-z #QuantumComputing #GoogleAI

New cybersecurity report finds ransomware attacks increased by 13% in 2022, with healthcare and education sectors being top targets. Experts urge organizations to prioritize security measures like data backups and software updates.

IoT devices are projected to reach over 30 billion by 2025, driven by growth in smart home, healthcare, and industrial sectors. Robust security measures are crucial as IoT expands. https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/internet-of-things/overview.html
